website_summaries.verdict: A fun squeaker ball keeps your dog's attention while you snap the perfect shot.
pros: Squeaker ball clips to top of smartphone
Removable so dog can play with ball
Works with both forward and rear-facing cameras
cons: Does not work with Otterbox, Lifeproof and Body Glove cases

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The only way we were able to get this picture! Might seem silly but totally worth it to us “crazy” pup parents!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: ***Not currently compatible with Otterbox, Lifeproof, or Bodyglove style cases.***
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't seen the note that the Pooch Selfie isn't compatible with the Otterbox case for iPhone, but I duct taped it to a chip clip--problem solved! The product works very well; mine went crazy for the squeaky ball--just a challenge to keep the pups from getting it! You can see Sofia licking her chops wanting it...
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Randall

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after adopting my adorable and excitable 2 year old rottweiler. I was hoping to get some nice pictures to share with friends and guess what this thing works! At first my fiancé mocked me for buying this but now he sees the great pictures and says this idea is genius. Titan loves tennis balls and the squeaky function really allows me to capture his attention. Just look for yourself at the pics I was able to get! All pet owners need this!
customer_reviews.author: Maranda

customer_reviews.title: This really grabbed the dogs attention!
customer_reviews.text: I love this, my dogs love balls so this works great! I found that if I held the ball with one hand, the dogs paid better attention to me, it also made it easier to press the camera button. It says selfie, but I used it turned the other way and it worked great too. It also worked on my 18 month old little boy😂, not quite as well, but it made a difference in quality of the pictures when he would look at the ball.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carol Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Great photo accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! After I opened the package, I immediately put it on my cellphone and before I could even call my dogs they were sitting next to me looking up at it, as if they were dying to know what the new toy was! They sat patiently waiting while I snapped a few pics. Then when I was done, I removed the ball from the device and played with them for awhile. Later, I put the ball back in the device, reattached it to my cellphone and snapped a few more pics. This works great! Nothing like a ball to get a dog's attention!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as successful as I hoped!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful for this product, saw the owner on shark tank and even ordered two, one for my sister. However, the problem is that most of us have phone cases on our phones and even my slim case prevented it from easily attaching to my phone, let a lone my husbands phone with it’s Otter case. So much potential, Georgia (our golden) was immediately interested in the ball but I couldn’t hold up the ball and manipulate the camera all at once. Wish I had a more promising review, really liked the owner and could relate to his love for dogs! All the best!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Eberly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this idea!! Kept my dogs attention for the perfect shot. Didn't fit my phone case perfectly (I have an Otterbox), but it is stated in the description that some cases are not currently compatible. Even though it didn't fit on my phone case snugly I made it work and would highly recommend it for a quick and fun way to get that perfect shot!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy, it really works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It worked immediately, my Labrador Retriever stood up at attention and held it a long time. I photograph "Buddy" wearing cute hats and ties. This will make the photo shoot so much easier. He's handsome for making greeting cards. A star is born!
customer_reviews.author: Shirlj

customer_reviews.title: Five Woofs for Perfect Pooch Pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this perfect pooch photo product on Shark Tank and ordered one for each family member before the episode was over. This product ensures perfect poses of your pooch each and every time. Simply snap onto your phone, squeak the ball that’s included, and Fido looks right at the camera. I sent one to my son, a dog trainer, and his four-legged clients love it. Five woofs!! Jason, the inventor, is a caring, devoted dog lover we should all want to support.
customer_reviews.author: Morelli Bass Girl

customer_reviews.title: My German Shepherd is super camera shy
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd is super camera shy. It's impossible to get a photo of him that isn't just a blur. However, the only thing that trumps that, is a ball. Before, I would have to hold the ball in 1 hand and maneuver my giant phone with the other to get a photo. But this item takes away all the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Rami Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: very cheap item. my ball doesn't squeak. I think you'd get the same dog response if you just held up a tennis ball with one hand. if your dog loves tennis balls, may work well. my dog is indifferent.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: SO fun! Definitely helps to get my dogs attention. I have a Nexus 5x - so it doesn't fit quite as well on the phone (it wasn't made for this phone to begin with) BUT it does fit, just needs to be adjusted after every pic. Overal super cute, well made, lots of fun! The photos I posted were taken with the pooch selfie on the phone :)
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, dogs want that ball!  Pretty well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get the perfect picture, it took several tries as my not so well trained dogs kept jumping up to get the actual ball off the phone. I finally got a few photos and put the ball and holder up on the counter, within 2 minutes I heard something and my dogs successfully got the holder and ball off the counter and were play fetch by themselves. The ball remained in the holder with a Lab and Border Collie each tossing it in the air. Very durable. Now it is way up on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, as soon as I put the device on my phone to shoot pictures, I was instantly able to take great shots. The problem I had was that my dog was tooooooo eager to get to the ball that I got really really really close up shots :-) If I just stand up instead of sitting on the couch, problem would be solved! I highly recommend this product if your dog loves balls. I'm assuming normal tennis balls would fit in here as well. Super smart idea! THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, and arrived without any damage
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, and arrived without any damage, but I feel the price doesn't match the product. I feel like the same thing could be accomplished with a clothespin and a tennis ball that's already owned. Make a slit in the bottom of the tennis ball just big enough for one leg of the clothespin, attach tennis ball via slit, them clip to phone. In fact, wanna go the extra mile and glue a strip of flat rubber band on each of the jaws of the clothespin for extra grip and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Ross k.

customer_reviews.title: Great, but won’t hold a hotdog
customer_reviews.text: This is the ONLY way to get my dog to look at the camera. And no, it will not hold a hotdog. That is still my favorite question on all amazon reviews.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but not practical
customer_reviews.text: Nice concept but not practical. Clip is only one size. Not adaptable to different phones or phones with cases. Have to take out of case to use, then afraid it will crack screen. Would be much better with an adjustable mount, like a spring clip to allow for different phone thicknesses. As far as getting dogs attention it works great
customer_reviews.author: KURT KNOX

customer_reviews.title: Freaking great!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, its a ten dollar plastic clip and a tennis ball. BUT - it does what they say, what I saw on Shark Tank. It helps you get great photos of your fur baby - awesome! It fit just fine on my IPhone 6 with UAG case, once I flipped it around the right way, the first try I covered the camera lens - duh! If you are expecting some kind of miracle from this, move on. If you think you are buying a ten dollar tennis ball, move on - you don't get it. For ten bucks, I can now get great photos of my dog - THAT is what this is all about. A+ product
customer_reviews.author: Jeff In NV

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it was my specific one, or if they are all the same, but this product didn't stay. My dog is super energetic and everytime he bumped me, the ball fell off the holster on the phone. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Stingel

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for non lifeproof case users
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with my lifeproof phone XS case. It will stay on for a minute then fall off and my dog tries to play with it. Works great for my husband’s iPhone X case. It’s much slimmer than mine. My dog loves the ball very much. I’ve been able to take great photos on my husband’s phone. Very annoying having to use his phone instead of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shot right out of the package!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally leave reviews for the many things i but I’m amazon but i must leave one for pooch selfie! This thing is literally magic. Right out of the package i got an amazing picture of my very non-photogenic, camera-hating pooch. Normally it takes about 30 pictures to get one semi-decent one. As you can see from the pictures I’m including... before pooch selfie he looked to the side, always eyes closed, moving, terrible. Pooch selfie... great shot! We saw the shark tank episode and i ordered it immediately. Love love love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jld14558

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the best
customer_reviews.text: I just received the pooch selfie yesterday and I was super excited to try it. I got to take some beautiful pictures of my cute dogs. However, when my husband tried it a couple of hours later he noticed that the fabric was coming off and the squeaky ball inside was not sounding anymore. No, I did not give it to my dogs to play with so I'm not even sure how that happened. I was disappointed because it really worked with my dogs and I was looking forward to using it to take pictures of my dogs on the trails.
customer_reviews.author: AnabANANA

customer_reviews.title: Too much fun not to buy
customer_reviews.text: It's so simple, yet so genius. My dog is very wiggly but also ball obsessed, so this solves the photo-taking problem with ease. It's hilarious to see him snap to attention the moment you bust it out. For $10 it provides plennnty of entertainment. A must have for wiggly dog owners (dogs who are wiggly, not the owners).
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Slattery

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this after seeing it on Shark Tank however I was so disappointed ☹️. It didn't work properly at all. The ball was hard as a rock & could NOT BE SQUEEZED AT ALL TO GET MY DOGS ATTENTION. The whole design needs to be done over. My friend bought one as well & had the SAME TROUBLE that I did. Both items were RETURNED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Important to verify it works with your phone case
customer_reviews.text: I really like the idea behind this product but it did not work well for me. I don't have a compatible phone case so I had to remove my phone to use this product. When I did, it held on ok, but felt like it might slip off my phone. Also, if my dog got ahold of the tennis ball that is included, I'd be replacing it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Helping Dogs find FURever homes through great photos!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Pooch Selfie for use at my shelter. Typically the photos we take are pretty crappy, as it's very hard to capture the dogs attention! Since using the pooch selfie we have been able to capture some really great photos and hopefully our adoption number will increase due to being able to capture the happy pets!! This is such a great idea!
customer_reviews.author: EFade

customer_reviews.title: Not outsmarted..
customer_reviews.text: My dog is too smart. (As I predicted) I did allow him to play with the ball before trying to take a picture, but he still noticed i was pointing my phone towards him. I didn't get very many good pics, maybe one really good picture. This was a good idea anyways. There are good and bad percs of having a smart dog. He's a border collie mix by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Dajanell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality ball and doesn't fit phones with a case
customer_reviews.text: For a couple of reasons, this didn't work for us at all. The ball is too hard to squeeze. When I removed it from the holder to use two hands to squeeze it a bit and try to soften it up, it ended up collapsing and falling apart. Zero quality. The holder will not fit on a phone with a case, so be aware that you MUST REMOVE THE PHONE CASE BEFORE ATTEMPTING TO ATTACH TO THE PHONE. This should be made clear in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: My dog is so much cuter than yours!! 😁
customer_reviews.text: This little device is genius!! Something so simple, yet first and foremost in most dogs brains!! It even encouraged me to get some more exercise, due to throwing the ball for my buddy and snapping some beautiful, hilarious, and perfect shots of him - and he’s looking directly at the camera every time!! Thanks so much, keep up the great ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Mikiedude

customer_reviews.title: Love this so much!  Easy to get pics with your Pups!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pooch Selfie - I bought one months ago and someone "borrowed" it. I guess they loved it too! I will buy more as gifts for my friends and keep this one in a safe place. Seriously this is a great gadget if you love taking pics of your dogs - either with or without a human in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky Ball Did Not Squeak
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute thing. I watched shark tank and saw this product and began to feel sentimental. I bought it and was excited to use it with my dogs but the ball does not squeak. It's almost hard as a rock too, so it was hard to even attempt to squeeze it but it just puffs air. It catches my dogs attention for a split second but without the squeaker, I can't use it long...disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun stocking stuffer for my boyfriend for Christmas. We recently adopted a ball-crazy dog and this works like a charm for both selfies and for traditional photos. In the picture I am including, his phone is in his right hand and a different item we wanted in the foreground is in his left hand.
customer_reviews.author: corgilover

customer_reviews.title: Finally perfect pictures of my Max!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! I am constantly taking pictures of my dog Max and he is rarely ever looking directly at the camera. Since receiving this product, I have not taken a single picture of Max without him looking directly at me (or should I say the squeaky ball at the top of my phone!) I love this product!!! I added 2 pictures of Max (before & after grooming!)
customer_reviews.author: Dishy24

customer_reviews.title: Works great lol
customer_reviews.text: This works great for getting my dog to look just above the camera. He gets laser focused on the ball and keeps trying to move toward the ball so I have to be quick about the picture.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product that makes dog pics even better and more fun.
customer_reviews.text: I saw this on shark tank, and was thoroughly impressed with the idea and the passion of the creator. I got it in the mail and my dog ran away with the ball before the the first pic. It's so much fun, a great idea and the images range from hysterical to beautiful when using this. What a great product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Licker

customer_reviews.title: My dog is too clever
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would work for other dogs, but my dog keeps running away and waiting for us to actually throw the ball. The picture above was take with my phone, while the ball was on my husband's phone....so for us, it works best if we team up against the dog. This is one of the best pictures of our high energy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Lee Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased the Pooch Selfie immeditately after seeing it on The Shark Tank...tried it out as soon as I got it and I was able to take beautiful pics of my dogs (attached). Not only they look straight at my smart phone, but their faces did not move, their eyes were locked on the ball a top of my mobile device. Excellent product and I am extremely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Q

customer_reviews.title: This Didn't Work For Me - But The Seller Cares About The Customer Experience
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Shark Tank and thought I'd take a chance. The attachment was very difficult to get on my phone (Samsung Note 9) with no case. Also, it was much too hard to press for the squeak. My little Shih-Tzu tore the ball apart in 10 minutes. Needs a major redesign. The seller got in touch with me after reading my review. He acknowledged my issues and says they will be addressed in version 2.0. I said I would try it again with the upgrades.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Robinson

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: No more stress of holding my phone in one hand and a toy in the other making crazy sounds only to get a decent blurry photo! Perfectly aligned with making it look like your pet is looking right at the camera and fun to actually use as a toy too! Bought this the second I saw it on Shark Tank without a second thought and I’m so happy I did! Literally taking this everywhere with me :) follow us on Instagram @bklynbeau 🐶
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on shark tank, i like taking photos of my dog but its hard since she won’t stay steady or look at the camera. I used this as soon as i got it and it really works! Now i can take more photos of my dog with her actually looking at the camera!
customer_reviews.author: chacha86

customer_reviews.title: Will not fit on iPhone 7 Plus - without the cover
customer_reviews.text: Saw on Shark Tank and ordered 2. Very disappointed that it does not attach to my iPhone 7 as claimed in the Product Description. It is so difficult to attach that it peeled off my protective film on my iPhone. Giving to daughters to see if it fits their iPhones.
customer_reviews.author: HM53

customer_reviews.title: Say Cheese!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! We have two Aussie shepherds that we think are beautiful, but getting them to pose for pics has always been a hassle. Not anymore! They are focused (pun intended) on the phone and make aussieome faces when they hear the ball squeak. I highly recommend this for anyone who likes to take pics of their pups. On a related note, this might even work for babies because of the squeaker :)
customer_reviews.author: Nolefans

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this project on Shark Tank and decided to buy it for my daughter... who is constantly taking pictures of her gorgeous dog. She thinks it's adorable and has made picture taking of her pooch a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: 4violet

customer_reviews.title: Gets attention!
customer_reviews.text: Hi Jason, I watched you on a rerun of Shark Tank and ordered two from Amazon for gifts. I think you had a great idea! Baby's would love this. I will let you know. Best dog lover gift! Thanks, Peg Clark NH
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Clark

customer_reviews.title: The only con, my dog keeps stealing my phone to take selfies
customer_reviews.text: It took a few days longer than expected to ship, however it was worth the wait. It's a brilliant product. With selfies being such a popular thing this makes including your canine companion a breeze while having fun too! If you're considering this, go for it! You'll be glad you did. None of the knockoffs have this quality nor do they have the attention grabbing colorful squeaking "tennis" type ball.
customer_reviews.author: ((TYPQL))

customer_reviews.title: Expensive & doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: Great idea, but it does not fit well on your phone if you have a protective case (Mous iPhone case) and it falls off a lot. Novel idea, see some with dog brisket holders and it does get the dog attention (until a squirrel runs by) lol
customer_reviews.author: Frank Balogh

customer_reviews.title: You wont regret it and delivers fast 10000% awesome lol
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very camera shy but this product is awesome it comes with squeaky ball you will be amazed I got so many funny pictures from using it just snaps right on top of your phone very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ludwick

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: My two ball-obsessed dogs kept jumping up knocking the ball and my phone out of my hand. The plastic piece holding the ball is flimsy and liable to break. If you don't attach it correctly to your phone it covers part of the photo lens. This item didn't work for me and seemed overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Two goldens

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap; seller won't take returns
customer_reviews.text: Frankly they are just crap. It won't stay clipped to the cell phone. I ordered 4 of these for xmas gifts and I wouldn't insult my friends or their dogs by giving them to them. I'll just throw them out. The bonus is the seller won't take returns. There was nothing noted in my order about not being able to return. Do NOT buy these or anything from Clever Dog Products!
customer_reviews.author: EDB

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can get a photo of my dog sitting still.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool for getting my dog to sit still for photos. He's really toy focused, and loves catching the ball once he sits still and gets snapped. He's a black poodle so it's difficult to get a clear shot. The Pooch Selfie fits easily on the phone and is not too heavy, so I can maneuver my phone with one hand. Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Dorje K

customer_reviews.title: BEST. THING. EVER.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST THING I HAVE EVER BOUGHT!!!!! If you LOVE taking pictures of your dog but your dog won’t look at the lens you must buy this. I would have easily paid $100 for the photos I just took of my dog the first 15 minutes using this (my dog is very ball driven). Love love love it. Even got him to calmly keep a hat on for a quick pic! Haha I have an iPhone 7 with a thin casemate case and it fit over it perfectly in a second and stayed on the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea T.

customer_reviews.title: Parents and Pups- Smile!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I saw it, couldn't resist, bought it and love it! My dog's love it too! I wish it came with a second tennis ball though so after the pictures, I could throw one to my pups. They think we are playing fetch when they see it- so its hard to get them to sit down and pose, but it does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet amazing. This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this hoping I could finally get some good photos of our 3 border collies. This thing is magical. I've been able to get some awesome pics with their undivided attention, unlike before the Pooch Selfie. I love this thing. I'd recommend it to anyone with active dogs who wants to get good pics.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Miller

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who loves posting photos of her dog, but her dog is rarely looking at the camera. Well, this worked! Her dog looks at the phone with the ball on top and my daughter gets great pictures! Then her dog grabbed the ball off the phone and had a little extra fun with it. This is a super clever gadget and a great gift for any dog lover!
customer_reviews.author: b.swale

customer_reviews.title: Hard to squeeze
customer_reviews.text: The whole idea behind this is that you can squeeze it to get the dog to look at the ball. The ball is so hard that you can't possibly squeeze it with one hand! I feel embarrassed that I fell for this product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Clair

customer_reviews.title: Cheap BUT entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 7 Plus with an otterbox on it. I had to take the otter box off to use this. Then, the ball kept falling off. I guess it was worth the few laughs I got seeing my dog's face, though. It's a pretty cheaply made product and I wouldn't recommend it or buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: I want to start by saying this is a great idea and my pup who will not look at a camera/phone if you point it at her wouldn't take her eyes off the ball. The only problem is, my phone has a protective case on it so i can't quite use the pooch selfie as intended. If the clip was a little more flexible or adjustable for phones with a protective case (I use an otter box so they can be a bit bulky), that would be a great enhancement to the product and make it 5 star!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S Novack

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy for tennis balls so this dog selfie stick works great to get, and keep, her interested long enough so I can take a few good pictures. I don't even have to squeak the ball. All I have to do is pick it up and before I even attach it to my phone, I have her undivided attention. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy B.

customer_reviews.title: Awkward
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to use but I guess it works. Used it once. I can get the same look from holding up a piece of chicken in my left hand while snapping a shot so ...
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It looks like good quality. i just received it yesterday. Got to play a little bit with my french bulldog. He was courios at first, later he got less interested, so It was a bit dificult to get the picture, but in general, good product, sturdy and the ball is a regular tenis ball. I also think the price was a bit excesive.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with durablility
customer_reviews.text: My pup did focus on the ball attached to the camera. As soon as the picture was taken she expected the ball so i gave it to her. With one chew on the ball, the squeaker stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: cin_sph66

customer_reviews.title: Must have if your dog won't look at camera
customer_reviews.text: Omg love this product. My aunt and i both have dogs that seem to know when we are trying to take pictures and they refuse to look at the phone. Now we have their attention thanks to this. Super happy and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Colie

customer_reviews.title: This doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.text: The clip does not secure the ball on the phone. I have tried with my case on and with the case off of my phone. The clip is not a clamp, but simply three pieces of plastic that you have to shove on to the phone and it immediately pops off of the phone as soon as you let go of it. It needs to have a spring loaded type clamp, like a binder clip or something, not just three pieces of semi rigid plastic. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki B.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit on phone with a case
customer_reviews.text: Definitely got my dogs attention, but it doesn’t fit on slim case for my iPhone X. So i have to hold it on with is about the same as just holding a ball on your phone... not really hands free if i still have to hold it there so it doesn’t pop off other than that, if you don’t keep a case on your phone and you have a “ball dog” it definitely gets their attention
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The Thing I Never Knew I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with the results, it's simple but so very clever. I have taken so many photos of my fur babies and every single time they look away. Thanks to this amazing invention this is now a problem in the past. Not only do they look but they react to the squeaky ball lol
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hawkey

customer_reviews.title: Not so good!
customer_reviews.text: I hate writing the not so good review. I can’t give more than one star / the unit kept falling off my phone (with a light case on it) and my daughters phone with no case on it. The ball doesn’t stay very well and really makes the phone top heavy. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Moon and Stars

customer_reviews.title: Good novelty gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a joke gift for my daughter‘s Christmas stocking, it ended up being a really fun thing even though the dog did try to eat the tennis ball. Will it make your dog sit still for a selfie? Maybe not but it’s a fun idea
customer_reviews.author: LJH

customer_reviews.title: Actually Works! Not With Phone Case Though.
customer_reviews.text: Actually works. Was able to get my dog to sit still long enough to take a bunch of pics. I did, however, had to take my phone case off because this wouldn’t fit over my case. I don’t have a big bulky case either. It’s a slim case, but it won’t fit unless you take off your case. Sits completely fine with a bare iPhone. I put my case back on when I’m done using the item.
customer_reviews.author: ES3

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this ball, I have no idea why, I mean he likes other balls but always runs straight to the camera with this one. Awesome product, now if it could just teach him to sit when i tell him
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works on kids too.
customer_reviews.text: It’s dumb but works. Attaches to your phone over the case and h pls keep their attention just long enough to take a picture. Only downside is that they can’t play with it after you use it so they’ll no doubt loose interest.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Absolutely does the trick! Didn't fit on my phone with the case on it (I have a Moto G phone), but it works so well it was worth removing my phone from the case to use it. Works well for selfies... but also works well for just taking regular photos of your pets. Also found out by accident that it works well with 2 year old kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit with a cover on the phone, but other wise great!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the holder will not fit on a phone case (my case isn't that big). Once I took the cover off, it fit and worked great! My dogs loved it so much they stole it off my nightstand so that they could play with the ball!!
customer_reviews.author: H. B Murray

customer_reviews.title: Really Works
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical, but it really does get my dogs to look at my phone camera. The only issue is I have a Golden Retriever who worships tennis balls, so I still have to take my pics quickly, before she attacks me for the ball. More of a spoiled dog problem than a product problem.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit over iPhone X slim case/ NO RETURN POLICY
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea if you wanted to take your case off every time and put this device with the ball on it. It's just not convenient. The middle piece should be more flexible and able to adjust to phone cases. This day and age who doesn't use a phone case? Make it easy for everyone. No return policy simply does not make for good customer service on this item. Thanks for a $10 tennis ball that my dog will destroy in 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: robert jarman

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit over my case.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to try and get my dog to look at the camera, it is super cheap, and it will not fit over my otter Box case, and when I tried to see if it would go on I almost broke it. Would not recommend unless you are the type of person who goes case-free.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Caron

customer_reviews.title: Pure Genius It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this I thought "Oh c'mon" & thought it was really stupid. My dog is very camera shy & runs & hides when I try to take his pic. Tennis balls are his favorite toys so the more I thought of it I thought why not try it. It came today & I put it on my phone. Now I have some of the cutest most awesome pics of him! He was so interested in the ball he didn't realize I was taking his pic. It really works & is pure genius!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit phone case.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have checked out the attachment more before I ordered it. It's a great concept and I love the idea. But it did not fit over my phone case. I don't have a bulky phone case either so each time I tried to use it I had to remove my phone case which is a huge inconvenience. I would have returned it by my dog chewed up the tennis ball. I just wish the attachment would have been more flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: The ball just stopped squeaking , which is what gets the dogs attention after only two or three uses. But, it did cause my dog to look at my camera, just wish the ball lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Early

customer_reviews.title: A must have for people who live to take pictures of their furry friends!
customer_reviews.text: Great Invention!!! My husband was on Shark Tank as well (Readerest) and I always love to give the new products a try! I took some pictures of my friend with her rambunctious Chocolate Lab and he couldn’t take his eyes off the ball. It was the perfect distraction to get a few really good shots in! I will use this again and again!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love shark tank -
customer_reviews.text: Saw this item on Shark Tank. It doesn't' fit a cell phone that has a case on it and the squeaker ball that came with it, stopped squeaking within the first day. Neat idea, but I would have returned it if I hadn't thrown the package away....
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad for Christmas because he is always trying to get all of our dogs to sit for a picture. The dogs ended up fighting over the tennis ball more than once so probably won't stick around long but without a doubt this ball was effective in grabbing their attention
customer_reviews.author: balltr

customer_reviews.title: Finally! Our Border mix takes a good picture!
customer_reviews.text: Fun! Gave the ball a squeek.. and she would not take her eyes off of it! - be sure and have another ball handy - we didn't want her to ruin the ball it came with ;)
customer_reviews.author: LJ Ruthemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: So cute! This product works great on both of my dogs, even the one who isn't in to tennis balls. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Read carefully so you aren't disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the product description clearly says the bracket won't work with cell phone covers but I ordered based off what I saw on Shark Tank and didn't bother to read the description. I was terribly disappointed!!! To the inventors- it's 2019 and people pay $1000 or more for their phone. They are going to protect it with a case. Make your product compatible please!
customer_reviews.author: Kara Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool idea that was poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: The tennis ball arrived being able to squeak which my dog loved. After about 5 times, the squeaker broke and the ball no longer makes sounds. My dog is still intrigued by the tennis ball itself, but the ball falls out of the holder and the holder would not fit on any of the standard phones we tried to place it on.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Albrecht

customer_reviews.title: SMILE
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My dogs like right at the camera.....and I have to hold her back from going at my phone! Ball can also be replaced if the dog does get to it. Best distraction for picture taking.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E

customer_reviews.title: What a great invention!!
customer_reviews.text: Jason, I LOVE this! What a great idea!! It's actually a gift for my granddaughter at Christmas. She has a dog she adores and is always taking pictures of her but the dog never looks at the camera. She will now!! You need to go on TV's Shark Tank!
customer_reviews.author: G-Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t able to use this product because it wouldn’t fit over my phone case. It does seem like it’d be great for phones without a case though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For Me/Not Durable a
customer_reviews.text: My phone has a case on it so it will not stay on. I decided to just give the ball to my pup. She had it less than a minute and the fabric pulled off in pieces. I had purchased 2 & was going to give 1 to a friend but definitely changed my mind. It is non-returnable so think before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: ceeceewon

customer_reviews.title: It was unanimously voted as the best gift of the night
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as part of a holiday grab bag at work since a number of my coworkers have dogs as pets. It was unanimously voted as the best gift of the night. I got a great picture the next day of the lucky dog who received it. Would highly recommend for others who are looking for presents for those with pups!
customer_reviews.author: EricM229

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pictures of your dog baby!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so awesome! Every time we tried to take a picture of Izzy prior to this product would result in blurry pictures, her head turned, or her head was just a blur with the rest of her in focus. Now, we get pictures of her that are simply cute. She loves tennis balls, but her rubber balls from Life is Good fit too and those are her favorites. Wish I had thought of this idea!
customer_reviews.author: Dina Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to get on the phone, will not fit over a case. Be careful if you have a screen protector because it will push it up when you try to put it on. Bought it on sale and am pretty happy, it is what I expected. Wouldn't pay full price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works, kinda, if someone else activates the squeaker.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, my dog won't stare at it unless it's squeaking. It was a nice try, but my dog still seems to think I'm trying to steal her soul when I take her pic.
customer_reviews.author: JP_RN

customer_reviews.title: As seen on TV!
customer_reviews.text: My pup definitely looks right into the camera now! It fits both apple phones and droids and regular tennis balls too. I loved the inventor on Shark Tank and I am glad I got to support him with this great product! I bought a few for my other friends dog - so affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hrivnak

customer_reviews.title: Brilliantly simple, genius invention
customer_reviews.text: This one will have you slapping your head and saying "Why didn't I think of that?" It does exactly what it says. It's reasonably priced. It's well made. I have shown it to all my friends and they are passing it along.
customer_reviews.author: swood61

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Really poor quality tennis ball. My dog chewed it up in 2 minutes. He almost choked on it. And the thing that holds the cell is cheap and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: traci scharfe

customer_reviews.title: Totally works
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift but they were excited and it totally works. Now her dog is pretty well behaved and watches the ball, I can imagine a few dogs that would leap for it if only at arm's length. Of course those could be good pictures too I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Easton

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying more.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Bought it for my sister (her dog's birthday present) & works so well that I'm going to buy one for myself & one for my parents. The ball works better than treats, as my parents lab becomes really focused & serious when it's treats, but with the ball gets excited & happy. The squeaky ball is a benefit--keeps their attention. Works with an otterbox case on a Samsung S7 edge,
customer_reviews.author: annebics

customer_reviews.title: Complete junk. Damages phone
customer_reviews.text: Ball squeaked one time then never again. Was not possible to put on phone with case. When I took off case it chipped my iPhone Xs screen. Crap
customer_reviews.author: Michael O. Boski

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: It really works! My dog is camera averse. As soon as he sees me pointing my phone at him he turns on his grumpy face. Well not with this ingenious contraption. I’m able to capture all those big goofy smile moments of my boy and I’m so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Corgimom2

product_meta.title: Pooch Selfie: The Original Dog Selfie Accessory (AS SEEN ON Shark Tank)
feature_bullets: Works with front and rear facing cameras without having to remove the device from your phone.
Squeaker ball for maximum attention grabbing. Take the absolute best selfies you will ever take with your pup.
Patented and trusted for great quality
Works on most phones and phone cases

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
